CursedGPTConfig.Description: CursedGPT leverages the Hugging Face Transformers library to interact with a pre-trained GPT-2 model. It employs TensorFlow for model management and AutoTokenizer for efficient tokenization. The script enables users to input prompts interactively, generating text responses from the GPT-2 model. To improve the user experience, unnecessary warning messages related to the transformers library are effectively suppressed.
